title: Lies Love Tells
description: Alternate cover edition ASIN: B0077AWZSGWhat would you do if your blog attracted the attention of a serial killer?Saze Monnivan begins a blog diary to vent emotions over her abusive partner Mr Him. Unleashing her inner thoughts provides Saze with the courage to kick Mr Him into touch.Unfortunately Mr Him is not the only person Saze needs to fear. A murderer stalks the streets of Eastcove, preying on young women and earning the moniker of Cut-throat Casanova.As Sazeâ€™s life peaks and falls spectacularly and her blog attracts interest and internet trolls, she realises someone is following more than just her blog posts.Is Saze foolish to trust new faces? Will she ever survive the terror which haunts her and find the love she craves?
author: Gina Dickerson
